title: Gender Change Potion
summaries: The Gender Change Potion is a potion which allows the player to change their sprite from male to female and vice versa. Hurt sounds and equipment sprites change accordingly. The effect is permanent, lasting infinitely unless another Gender Change Potion is used to change gender again.

statistics.Sell: 2
